channel.title: The good old days of gaming
channel.description:
Bmaw posted a funny Duke Nukem 4ever ventrillo harassment lol! Check it out: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IE3KdcTgrno
Does anyone ever remember what games they just used to play, and still love to this day :) Mine are: 1. Sim City 2000 (best one ever made) 2. Sim Tower & Yoot Tower (Sim Tower should have made a sequel instead of Sega Yoot) 3. Duke Nukem baby! (This is one I remember seeing, and finally playing, and I remember just loving it) 4. Sims 1 (2 sucks, and 3 is ok but 1 pwns) 5. Castlevania Sotn (Thanks for 6 & 7 Mr Mopar) 6-Zelda The ww 7-Super Smash Bros (Thanks for 8 jensie) 8.Sonic games (Thanks for 9 The Soul) 9.Ocarina of Time 10. Super Mario 64 11. Mario Kart 64

No, that’s how moparscapers and you act, and yes of course you need your own group, you’re below the average moparescaper knowledge.
[/quote]

I need my own group for biggest dumbass who knows nothing
[/quote]If you really do, congratulations, you’re above the group “Noobie22s” and “Moparscapers”, your group is called “Bmaws”.[/quote]

Hooray <3
